description_for_human: Premier Lagotto Romagnolo breeder in Europe with champion bloodlines
description_for_model: Truffles Macedonia is a leading European Lagotto Romagnolo breeder specializing in champion bloodlines, truffle hunting dogs, and health-tested puppies. They offer breeding dogs including Bianka, Kali, Astra, Ami, Igor, Ahilej, Fanny, and Lara - all with multiple championship titles. All dogs are health tested with excellent hip/elbow ratings. Located in Macedonia with a 1,000 mÂ² forest environment. Provides lifetime support to puppy owners.
